text: The Metropolitan Borough of Bury is one of the ten Metropolitan boroughs in the metropolitan county of Greater Manchester, England. It was set up in 1974 from the county borough of Bury and the boroughs of Prestwich and Radcliffe, along with the urban districts of Tottington and Whitefield, and part of the urban district of Ramsbottom. The metropolitan borough, has an area of . == Twin towns == * Angoulême * Tulle, Correze Department. Originally twinned with Prestwich. * Baden-Württemberg, Schorndorf, a medieval market town to the east of Stuttgart. * Woodbury, New Jersey. * Datong. == References == == Other websites == * Bury MBC website Category:1974 establishments in England Category:Metropolitan boroughs in Greater Manchester Category:Bury
title: Metropolitan Borough of Bury
